mapper.select: select sid.collect_iamge1_id collectIamge1, sid.collect_iamge2_id collectIamge2, sid.collect_iamge3_id collectIamge3, sid.collect_iamge4_id collectIamge4, sid.collect_location collectLocation, sid.collect_remark collectRemark, sid.collect_time collectTime, sid.create_time createTime, sid.collect_date collectDate, sid.sample_data sampleData, sid.special_note specialNote, si.factor_point factorPoint, su.emp_name collectUser from t_sample_item_data sid left join t_sample_item si on sid.sample_item_id = si.id left join t_sys_user su on sid.collect_user_id = su.user_id where sid.sample_item_id = #{sampItemId}

select sii.aval_draw_count avalDrawCount, sii.draw_count drawCount, sii.audit_time auditTime, sid.collect_location collectLocation, sid.collect_time collectTime, sid.create_time createTime, sid.collect_date collectDate, sid.collect_remark sampRemark, ss.store_location storeLocation, ss.send_user sendUser, ss.store_time storeTime from t_sample_item sii left join t_sample_item_data sid on sii.id = sid.sample_item_id left join t_sample_store_list ss on sii.id = ss.sample_item_id where sii.id = #{sampItemId}

select sii.id sampItemId, sii.sample_no sampleNo, sii.audit_reason auditReason, sii.sample_status sampleStatus, sii.factor_point factorPoint, sii.secd_class_name secdClassName, sii.secd_class_id secdClassId, sii.sample_user_id collectLeaderId, sj.project_name projectName, sj.consignor_name consignorName, sj.inspection_linker inspectionLinker, sj.inspection_name inspectionName, sj.inspection_linker_phone inspectionLinkerPhone, sj.start_date startDate, sj.end_date endDate, sj.project_address taskAddress, sj.job_remark jobRemark, sid.collect_time collectTime, sid.collect_date collectDate, sid.sample_data sampleData, sid.collect_location collectLocation, sid.collect_user_id collectUserId, sid.review_user_id reviewUserId, sid.collect_remark collectRemark, sid.special_note specialNote from t_sample_item sii left join t_sample_item_data sid on sii.id = sid.sample_item_id left join t_sample_task sti on sii.sample_task_id = sti.id left join t_schedule_job sj on sti.job_id = sj.id where sii.id = #{sampItemId}
